title: How to Add Approved Senders to Yahoo! Mail

steps.title: Open your Yahoo!
steps.content: Open your Yahoo! email account. Fill in your password, etc., as required.

steps.title: Click "Settings".
steps.content: Click "Settings". This is located at the top right part of your screen.

steps.title: Enter email address in Filter Name.
steps.content: Enter email address in Filter Name.

steps.title: In the pull-down menu for "Move the message to," choose "Inbox".
steps.content: In the pull-down menu for "Move the message to," choose "Inbox".

steps.title: The pull-down menu is under "Choose a folder to move to".
steps.content: The pull-down menu is under "Choose a folder to move to".
